title: New Oceania Skin please
body: I suggest we get a new FREE Oceania skin, something like an aboriginal Gnar with a boomerang or even a great feature ABOUT Oceania. What do you guys think we should have?

replies.body:
Don't understand why people haven't dropped this discussion yet. I didn't like the idea of having to pay, or the idea of the skin itself. I eventually accepted that Riot won't budge so I got over it. I now own the skin because I wanted to contribute to charity and tbh if you overlook all the negatives, the ability effects aren't all that bad. Still would've liked to see it on a different champion, but nonetheless I'd like to see you make a better skin, have everyone rage and still not budge. It's hard to please everyone.

In all honesty people are sooks. I cannot understand why people haven't got over this yet. Obviously Riot won't change their decision and miraculously give everyone the skin for free or make a new skin. Deal with it and stop complaining.

People will keep complaining until Riot either acknowledge the complaints or the people complaining realise the futility of complaining.

I'm not at that stage yet, so don't mind me. Maybe you should deal with it and stop complaining about the complainers :P

But Riot has already acknowledged the complaints by stating that the skin wouldn't be given out for free. People need to stop sooking and grow the fuck up. They're whining about pixels for gods sake. People need to realise it's only a game, and a skin doesn't mean shit in real life.

EDIT: Pretty sure half the people who complained still bought the skin anyway so they contradicted everything they said.

Would you have a link for Riot specifically stating that? Or even that they've addressed complaints at all?

Personally, that'd shut me right up.

Edit: As for people buying the skin anyway, you're possibly correct. Two people I know have bought the skin and still complained. Go figure :P

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/yHhIOYjO-letos-talk-about-the-server-skin?comment=00590017

Top comment complains about it not being free, Riot responds but doesn't explicitly say that they'd be giving the skin out for free, and hence, it costs. They addressed multiple complaints in that thread also, should you need further evidence that they wouldnt change the skin/make a new one.
Ah thank you. For some reason my thingy was showing comments by age, not rating. That, combined with my lack of forum visiting means I missed the comment.

i have big ideas here come to my discussion :3

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/PmE8z55E-visual-and-skin-update
180 ping is fine, lots of people I know in oceania get like 30.
That logic works both ways mate ;)

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/50FixXhb-boycotting-cosmic-reaver-kassadin

I made a poll about the new skin. Head over there and vote so we can get an accurate idea of how many people actually like/hate it! Thank you xx

Cosmic Reaver Kassadin for free would be enough for me. After all, it is the server skin.

Besides the Pool Party Ziggs skin people got for transferring here in Beta? How many people even have that? Most of my friends wouldn't play this game until they made an OCE server.
